page.title: 08A REGULAR SCHOOL EVENT
page.content: {THE SCHOOL SPONSORED WALK} Every other year our school has a sponsored walk along this stretch of the promenade;we walk six miles each way, so that makes a total walk of twelve miles. The whole school enters, including the teachers, and even dogs have been taking part,wearing school scarves. Last year they were banned because one bit a teacher who was riding a bicycle up and down. The smallest children in the school walk only six miles, but all those over 11 try to do the full twelve and most of them manage it. The money is usually shared between the Church of England Children's Society and our own school funds. Last time we put some money in our School Bursary Fund, which provides scholarships for children who would like to come to our school.
